name: Fort Lauderdale
description: Licensed Fort Lauderdale electricians providing 24/7 professional electrical services. From waterfront luxury lighting to commercial properties on Las Olas, Solomon Electric is your trusted partner for all electrical needs.
landmarks: Broward Center for the Performing Arts

challenges.title: Waterfront Electrical Safety
challenges.description: Fort Lauderdale's extensive canal system and Intracoastal access require specialized dock wiring, boat lift power, and corrosion-resistant outdoor lighting.

challenges.title: Downtown Commercial Infrastructure
challenges.description: The complex power needs of Fort Lauderdale's growing downtown skyline demand expertise in commercial electrical distribution and advanced fire/safety systems.

challenges.title: Historic Home Modernization
challenges.description: Neighborhoods like Sailboat Bend and Rio Vista feature beautiful historic homes that require sensitive electrical upgrades to handle modern energy loads.

faqs.question: Do you install electrical for boat lifts and dock pedestals in Fort Lauderdale?
faqs.answer: Yes—waterfront electrical is one of our specialties in the Venice of America. We install and repair dock pedestals, boat lift motors, shore power connections, and marine-grade lighting throughout Las Olas Isles, Rio Vista, and Harbor Beach. All waterfront electrical must meet strict NEC Article 555 requirements for marina safety. We ensure your dock electrical is safe, code-compliant, and properly protected from corrosion.

faqs.question: Why is Fort Lauderdale electrical work different from inland areas?
faqs.answer: Fort Lauderdale's extensive canal system means many properties deal with higher humidity, salt exposure, and flooding risks that inland homes don't face. We use corrosion-resistant hardware, marine-grade connections, and elevated installation techniques for outdoor electrical. Properties on the Intracoastal or in flood zones require special attention to weatherhead height, panel placement, and GFCI protection zones.

faqs.question: Can you upgrade the electrical in my Victoria Park or Sailboat Bend home?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. These historic Fort Lauderdale neighborhoods have beautiful older homes that often need careful electrical modernization. We've upgraded dozens of 1920s-1950s homes in Victoria Park and Sailboat Bend—replacing outdated panels, installing proper grounding, and adding capacity for modern living while preserving the character that makes these neighborhoods special. Many of these homes still have original 60-amp service that desperately needs upgrading.

faqs.question: What permits do I need for electrical work in Fort Lauderdale?
faqs.answer: All significant electrical work in Fort Lauderdale requires Broward County permits. This includes panel upgrades, new circuits, EV chargers, and outlet additions. We handle all permitting with Broward County—you don't need to visit the building department or coordinate inspections. Our 100% inspection pass rate means your project won't face delays or re-work.

faqs.question: Do you provide electrical services for vacation rentals on Fort Lauderdale Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with many vacation rental owners on Galt Ocean Mile and Fort Lauderdale Beach. Common needs include adding outlets for guest convenience, installing smart locks and thermostats, upgrading lighting for better photos, and ensuring all GFCIs work properly (a common guest complaint). Quick turnaround between tenants is essential—we schedule around your booking calendar.

faqs.question: How fast can you respond to emergencies near Las Olas or Downtown Fort Lauderdale?
faqs.answer: We maintain coverage across Broward County to assist with electrical requirements in central Fort Lauderdale. For situation-specific emergencies—such as sparking or burning smells—we prioritize the allocation of technical resources.

seoContent.heading: Fort Lauderdale's Trusted Electrical Experts
seoContent.body: Known as the 'Venice of America' for its intricate canal system, Fort Lauderdale is a hub of maritime, commercial, and residential excellence. Solomon Electric is proud to serve this vibrant city, providing the specialized electrical knowledge needed for its unique waterfront lifestyle and booming urban core. Our licensed team is dedicated to keeping Fort Lauderdale powered safely and efficiently.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Fort Lauderdale's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Fort Lauderdale homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Broward County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Fort Lauderdale's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Fort Lauderdale Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Fort Lauderdale. Our licensed team follows all safety protocols, respects your property, and maintains the technical standards that have defined our South Florida service for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Corner of Fort Lauderdale
seoContent.body: Whether you're maintaining a waterfront estate in Rio Vista, upgrading a commercial space on Las Olas, or restoring a historic gem in Victoria Park, Solomon Electric brings 15 years of professional experience to your door. We understand Fort Lauderdale's specific code requirements and environmental challenges, delivering results that stand the test of time.
